name: Fairytale Figurine: Night's Nemesis
description: An exquisite clockwork owl model that can be placed on a "Good Shelf" for display.\nThis model is said to derive from a story about an "Owl Musician." In this tale, owls who could see through the dark became the eyes of soldiers trapped in the "night," guiding them to victory. As such, the owls gained the title "Night's Nemeses."
